alert.note: Alert for Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 1:12PM EDT by NWS Miami
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Collier County through 200 PM EDT... At 111 PM EDT, National Weather Service meteorologists were tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms 11 miles north of Copeland, or 14 miles south of Ave Maria, moving northwest at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Naples, Golden Gate Estates, Naples Park, Belle Meade, Marco Island Airport, Orangetree, Naples Manor, Golden Gate, East Naples, Lely Resort, West Toll Gate On Alligator Alley, Vineyards, North Naples, Pelican Bay, Lely, South Blocks Golde, Rookery Bay Aquatic Preserve, Fakahatchee Strand State Preserve, Picayune Strand State Forest and Intersection I-75 And Everglades Blvd. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: These winds can down small tree limbs and branches, and blow around unsecured small objects. Seek shelter in a safe building until the storm passes. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Collier County; Inland Collier County
